channel.title: Server/Client Crashing
channel.description:
For some reason everytime I kill an NPC on my server, Bronze Scape (project 16 v_2 source), either my client or my server crashes. In my server CMD window I get the error:
Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: -1
at NPCHandler.MonsterDropItems(NPCHandler.java:338) at NPCHandler.process(NPCHandler.java:292) at server.main(server.java.:45)
Any idea's on how I can fix this so when I kill an NPC my server or client, which ever one it is, doesn't crash?[br][size=1]Posted at: July 12, 2006, 06:08:53 AM[/size][hr]Also, I have found out that there is no error in my client CMD window. So I must assume it is my server?[br][size=1]Posted at: July 12, 2006, 06:11:55 AM[/size][hr]wtf no ideas?

item.title: Server/Client Crashing
item.dc:creator: @Palidino76 Palidino76
item.description:
@Palidino76 wrote:

Something is wrong with ur item dropping when an mpc dies, Id tell you how to fix but many npcdrop item things are diffrent… maybe post your npchandler.java and ill have a look, also if you have like a npcdrops.cfg, post that also

Read full topic
